alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 10:00PM CDT until September 10 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles east of Valley De Oro to 6 miles southeast of Buffalo Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Hereford, Canyon, Panhandle, Claude, Lake Tanglewood, Buffalo Lake, Bushland, Wayside, Valley De Oro, Washburn, Umbarger, Wildorado, Palo Duro Canyon, Mescalero Park, Dawn, Timbercreek Canyon, and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Potter; Randall
